targets.alias: $col  - Entry ID: $tag_entry - Origin: $tag_origin - Src:$tag_src - Dest:$tag_dest - Protocol:$tag_protocol
targets.query: SELECT last("ingress_matches_in_pkts"), last("egress_matches_in_pkts") FROM "policy" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$Hostname$/ AND "entry" =~ /^$Entry_ID$/ AND "name" =~ /^$Filter$/ AND "origin" =~ /^$Origin$/ AND "src" = '0.0.0.0/0_any') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "entry", "dest", "hostname", "name", "origin", "protocol" fill(null)

targets.alias: Slot: $tag_slot_number Filter Name: $tag_filter_name  - Metric Name - Entry ID: $tag_entry_id : $col
Slot: $tag_slot_number Filter Name: $tag_filter_name  - Metric Name - Entry ID: $tag_entry_id : $col
Slot: $tag_slot_number Filter Name: $tag_filter_name  - Metric Name - Entry ID: $tag_entry_id : $col
targets.query: SELECT last("card/egress_rate_limiter/dropped_pkt") AS "Egress Dropped_pkt", last("card/egress_rate_limiter/forwarded_pkt") AS "Egress Forwarded_pkt", last("card/egress_rate_limiter/offered_pkt") AS "Egress Offered_pkt" FROM "sros_ip_filter_stats" WHERE ("source" = 'ch-zrh03b-ri1' AND "filter_name" =~ /^$Filter$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "filter_name", "slot_number" fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values from "policy" with key="hostname"

list.query: show tag values from "policy" with key="hostname"

list.definition: show tag values from "policy" with key="name" where("hostname"=~ /$Hostname/)

list.query: show tag values from "policy" with key="name" where("hostname"=~ /$Hostname/)

list.definition: show tag values from "policy" with key="entry" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/)
list.label: Entry ID
list.name: Entry_ID
list.query: show tag values from "policy" with key="entry" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/)

list.query: show tag values from "policy" with key="origin" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/)

list.definition: show tag values from "policy" with key="src" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/ AND "entry" =~ /^$Entry_ID$/ )
list.name: Source
list.query: show tag values from "policy" with key="src" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/ AND "entry" =~ /^$Entry_ID$/ )

list.definition: show tag values from "policy" with key="dest" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/ AND "entry" =~ /^$Entry_ID$/ )

list.query: show tag values from "policy" with key="dest" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/ AND "entry" =~ /^$Entry_ID$/ )

list.query: show tag values from "policy" with key="protocol" where("name"='$Filter' AND "hostname"=~ /$Hostname/ AND "entry" =~ /^$Entry_ID$/ )
